name: Easy Fried Scallops
author: MBeau
summary: I experimented with some ways to cook scallops one night with my family. This was everyone's favorite and it has become a regular dish at our family fry nights. If serving as a main dish, make twice as many servings as people (about 8 scallops per person).
directions: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine flour, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl
Immerse 4 or 5 scallops in the bowl of buttermilk
Transfer to the flour mixture; roll around until thickly coated
Lower scallops gently into the hot oil
Cook until golden and crispy, 3 to 4 minutes
Drain on a plate lined with paper towels
